Synopsis: Tests the WinRM connectivity on the specified computers.
Description: The Test-WinRM function tests the WinRM connectivity on the specified computers and returns the status of the connection.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Test-WinRM -ComputerName "Server01", "Server02"
Tests the WinRM connectivity on Server01 and Server02.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Test-WinRM -ComputerName "Server03"
Tests the WinRM connectivity on Server03.
